data.title: Maria Cristina Park, Taifa Of Algeciras
data.meta_description: Do you want to know the entry ticket price for Maria Cristina Park? Opening & closing timings, parking options, restaurants nearby or what to see on your visit to Maria Cristina Park? Click Now to check the details!
data.text:
You will definitely be pleased to visit the Maria Cristina Park. It is a wonderful public park that dates back to the 19th century. Being located in the heart of the city, this open park can be accessed easily. The park is pretty large and covers an area of 30,000 square meters. This rectangular place is fantastic, decorated with flower beds, large trees, shrubberies, and bushes. Trees like pines, Jupiter, palm, ficus, and cedar make the whole place cool and breezy. You can also find many concrete sitting areas around the park. This is the reason the location offers a pleasing ambience which both grownups and kids like to enjoy throughout the year.
